name: RLGL
description:
An old classic, redesigned for mobile. Move on green, stop on red, and aim for the high score!

How to Play

  • When the screen flashes green, tap as fast as you can to "run". Keep moving though: if you stop tapping, you're out! The faster you move, the more points you get!
  • When the screen is red, don't touch the phone! If you "move" when it's a red light, it's game over!
  • As your score gets higher and higher, the game gets tougher. You'll have to tap faster to keep up on green lights, and stop quicker on red ones. Do you have what it takes to beat the high score?
